job_categories.name: Information Technology
job_categories.description: Jobs related to computers, software development, IT support, and network administration.

job_categories.name: Healthcare
job_categories.description: Jobs related to healthcare professionals such as doctors, nurses, pharmacists, and medical technicians.

job_categories.name: Finance
job_categories.description: Jobs related to banking, accounting, financial analysis, and investment management.

job_categories.name: Education
job_categories.description: Jobs related to teaching, school administration, and educational support.

job_categories.name: Engineering
job_categories.description: Jobs related to designing, building, and maintaining infrastructure and technology.

job_categories.name: Sales
job_categories.description: Jobs related to selling products or services, including sales management and retail.

job_categories.name: Marketing
job_categories.description: Jobs related to promoting and advertising products or services.

job_categories.name: Customer Service
job_categories.description: Jobs related to assisting customers with inquiries, complaints, and support.

job_categories.name: Human Resources
job_categories.description: Jobs related to recruiting, training, and managing employees within an organization.

job_categories.name: Art and Design
job_categories.description: Jobs related to creative fields such as graphic design, fashion design, and fine arts.
